testcase.name: an Employee adds their proof
testcase.system-out: Given an Employee is on the Update Request page.............................passed When the Employee enters their "2" and their "2" and their "pass" and clicks Submit Changes.passed Then the Employee sees the Success message..................................passed

testcase.name: an Employee adds their proof 2
testcase.system-out: Given an Employee is on the Update Request page.............................passed When the Employee enters their "6" and their "6" and their "pass" and clicks Submit Changes.passed Then the Employee sees the Success message..................................passed

testcase.name: the Employee can submit a request
testcase.system-out: Given an Employee is on the Submit Requests page............................passed When the Employee enters their "7" and their "Veth" and their "Brenatto" and their "7/3/2022" and their "4:46 PM" and their "5" and their "Crossbow Training" and their "30" and their "Better aim" and their "1" and clicks the Submit button.passed Then the Employee should see the Successful Submit message..................passed

testcase.name: the Employee can submit a request 2
testcase.system-out: Given an Employee is on the Submit Requests page............................passed When the Employee enters their "5" and their "Caduceus" and their "Clay" and their "7/3/2022" and their "4:48 PM" and their "6" and their "Tea Preparation" and their "20" and their "Tea" and their "1" and clicks the Submit button.passed Then the Employee should see the Successful Submit message..................passed

Given an Employee is on the View Requests page..............................passed When the Employee clicks on the View Requests button........................passed Then the Employee can see all requests they have submitted..................passed

testcase.name: the Finance Manager changes the Reimbursement Amount
testcase.system-out: Given a Finance Manager is on the Update Reimbursement Amount page..........passed When the Finance Manager enters the "2", "2", and "40500" and clicks submit.passed Then the Finance Manager sees the Success message...........................passed

testcase.system-out: Given a Finance Manager is on the Update Reimbursement Amount page..........passed When the Finance Manager enters the "1", "1", and "240" and clicks submit...passed Then the Finance Manager sees the Success message...........................passed

testcase.name: the Finance Manager changes the Request Status
testcase.system-out: Given a Finance Manager is on the Change Request Status page................passed When the Finance Manager enters the "2", "2", and "5" and clicks the submit button.passed Then the Finance Manager sees a message of Success..........................passed
